ticket.title: alias on association method and reload
ticket.original-body:
1) Add alias to association method (has_many in my case)
* has_many :long_association_names * alias :short_names :long_association_names
2) Create an instance of the AR object & everything works fine
* @aliased_object = AliasedObject.first * @aliased_object.short_names #=> [collection of long names objects]
3) Reload the object and call aliased method * @aliased_object.reload * @aliased_object.short_names #=> INTERNAL ERROR!!! Association named 'short_names' was not found; perhaps you misspelled it? * /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activerecord-2.3.4/lib/active_record/association_preload.rb:115:in `preload_one_association'
